";s:11:"screenshots";s:1094:"<ol><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/antispam-bee/assets/screenshot-1.png?rev=2492113"><img src="https://ps.w.org/antispam-bee/assets/screenshot-1.png?rev=2492113" alt="Block or allow comments from specific countries."></a><p>Block or allow comments from specific countries.</p></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/antispam-bee/assets/screenshot-2.png?rev=2492113"><img src="https://ps.w.org/antispam-bee/assets/screenshot-2.png?rev=2492113" alt="Allow comments only in certain languages."></a><p>Allow comments only in certain languages.</p></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/antispam-bee/assets/screenshot-3.png?rev=2492113"><img src="https://ps.w.org/antispam-bee/assets/screenshot-3.png?rev=2492113" alt="Add useful spam stats to your dashboard."></a><p>Add useful spam stats to your dashboard.</p></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/antispam-bee/assets/screenshot-4.png?rev=2492113"><img src="https://ps.w.org/antispam-bee/assets/screenshot-4.png?rev=2492113" alt="Tailor WordPress&#039; spam management to your workflow."></a><p>Tailor WordPress' spam management to your workflow.</p></li></ol>";}s:17:"short_description";s:159:"Antispam plugin with a sophisticated tool set for effective day to day comment and trackback spam-fighting. WP</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:38:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/britner";s:8:"requires";s:3:"5.8";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.8.2";s:12:"requires_php";b:0;s:6:"rating";i:98;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:98;i:4;i:2;i:3;i:2;i:2;i:1;i:1;i:0;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:103;s:15:"support_threads";i:35;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:14;s:10:"downloaded";i:3995306;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2021-10-20 9:28pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2018-08-19";s:8:"homepage";s:59:"https://www.kadencewp.com/product/kadence-gutenberg-blocks/";s:8:"sections";a:4:{s:11:"description";s:8865:"<p>Kadence Blocks adds custom blocks and options to extend Gutenberg’s editing capabilities so you can create stunning websites with ease – no code required. Kadence Blocks is your toolkit that makes the WordPress block editor capable of creating beautiful content that’s usually only possible through page builder plugins. Each block is crafted with care with regard to performance, accessibility, and extensibility.</p>
<h4>Try Kadence Blocks</h4>
<p>See Kadence Blocks in action with <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/try/" rel="nofollow ugc">the live Demo Testing</a></p>
<h4>Custom Blocks Include</h4>
<ul>
<li>Row Layout &#8211; Create rows with nested blocks either in columns or as a container. Give style to your rows with a background, overlay, padding, etc. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/row-layout-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Advanced Gallery &#8211; Create stunning photo galleries, carousels, and sliders! Enable custom links, captions, and more. Plus you can select the image size for performance. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/custom-blocks/advanced-gallery/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Form &#8211; Our powerful form block allows you to easily create a contact or marketing form and style it within the block editor. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/form-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Advanced Heading &#8211; Transform your headings to Advanced Headings and customize the font family (even Google fonts), color, size, style, and highlight words. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/advanced-heading-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Advanced Button &#8211; Create an advanced button or a row of buttons. Style each one, including hover controls. Plus you can use an icon and display them side-by-side. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/advanced-button-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Tabs &#8211; Create custom vertical or horizontal tabs with advanced styling controls. Each tab content is an empty canvas able to contain any other blocks. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/tabs-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Accordion &#8211; Create beautiful accordions! Each pane is able to contain any other block, customize title styles, content background, and borders. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/accordion-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Testimonials &#8211; Create confidence in your brand or product by showing off beautiful and unique testimonials. Display add as a carousel or a grid. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/testimonial-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Icon &#8211; Choose from over 1500+ SVG icons to add into your page and style the size, colors, background, border, etc. You can also add multiple icons side-by-side. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/icon-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Spacer / Divider &#8211; Easily create a divider and determine the space around it or just create some space in your content. You can even define the height per screen size. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/spacer-divider-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Info Box &#8211; Create a box containing an icon or image and, optionally, a title, description, and learn more text. Style static and hover separately. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/info-box-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Icon List &#8211; Add beautiful icons to your lists and make them more engaging and attract viewers’ attention. Over 1500 icons to choose from and unlimited styles. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/icon-list-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Countdown &#8211; Increase your conversions by adding a sense of urgency to your offering. Pro includes evergreen campaigns as well. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/countdown-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Posts &#8211; Display a clean grid of posts anywhere on your site, great for your homepage where you want to tease your blog. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/custom-blocks/post-block/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
<li>Table of Contents &#8211; Allow your readers to navigate your content easily with a table of contents block. Includes smooth scroll to anchor. <a href="https://www.kadencewp.com/kadence-blocks/table-of-contents/?utm_source=wordpress&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=read-me&amp;utm_content=kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">Learn more</a></li>
</ul>
<h4>Video Tutorial</h4>
<p><span class="embed-youtube" style="text-align:center; display: block;"><iframe loading="lazy" class="youtube-player" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SYb24ncjVsY?version=3&#038;rel=1&#038;showsearch=0&#038;showinfo=1&#038;iv_load_policy=1&#038;fs=1&#038;hl=en-US&#038;autohide=2&#038;wmode=transparent" allowfullscreen="true" style="border:0;" sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin allow-popups allow-presentation"></iframe></span></p>
<h4>Key Block Features</h4>
<ul>
<li>Intelligent Load – Kadence Blocks only loads CSS or Javascript when you need it and only for the blocks you are using on a specific page.</li>
<li>Responsive Controls – Tweak your design for each screen size. Edit tablet and mobile settings while previewing in WordPress editor.</li>
<li>Typography Controls – Choose from 900+ Google fonts and design your site with complete typography control.</li>
<li>Color &amp; Background Controls – Gradients, overlays, parallax backgrounds, borders, etc. You can control all the design settings!</li>
<li>Configurable Defaults – Make development a breeze. Once the default settings are defined, every time you add a block those settings will automatically be applied.</li>
<li>Setting Visibility Controls – Hide block settings from certain user roles so they can focus on content and you can keep them out of the block designs.</li>
<li>Spacing Controls – Control paddings and margins for your blocks in whatever units you like. Customize responsively for precision spacing and design.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Custom Editor Max Width Settings</h4>
<p>One of the challenges with creating column and row layouts in Gutenberg is the width of the editor in your admin. By default, Gutenberg uses a 650px max width for the content editor. When adding text to a sidebar template, this works great, as the max width in the editor is comparable to the content width when using a sidebar. However, for content going into pages where you don’t have a sidebar, it is a poor representation of what you are going to get on the front end of your site. Not to mention, it makes for a cramped space to work in if you are trying to manage a row with three columns.</p>
<p>In an effort to create an easier way to use Gutenberg in a more “page building experience” we created a simple method that allows you to change the default max width for pages and posts, as well as individually through a page by page setting.</p>
<h4>Source files</h4>
<p><a href="https://github.com/kadencewp/kadence-blocks" rel="nofollow ugc">github</a></p>
<h4>Support</h4>
<p>We are happy to help as best we can with questions! Please use the support forums.</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:47067:"<h4>2.1.15</h4>
<p>Release Date: October 20th, 2021<br />
* Update: Icon list to have responsive column options.<br />
* Update: Accordion with button label option.<br />
* Update: Full height columns with alignment.<br />
* Update: Row layout overlay for better parallax support in chrome.<br />
* Update: Accordion JS for better old browser support.<br />
* Fix: Better style reload for widgets in customizer.<br />
* Fix: issue with alpha colors in some cases.<br />
* Fix: Issue with user visibility settings and widget area.<br />
* Fix: Tablet layout settings.<br />
* Fix: Possible issue with form in sidebar.<br />
* Fix: Infobox sponsored link.</p>
<h4>2.1.14</h4>
<p>Release Date: October 8th, 2021<br />
* Add: Hover Options to columns.<br />
* Update: Testimonial container padding controls.<br />
* Update: Post excerpt length options for post block.<br />
* Fix: Issue widgets and form block.</p>

* Fix: Issue with google font loading in widget area.<br />
* Fix: Moving Tab Order.</p>

* Update: Prebuilt Library (New Interface!).<br />
* Update: Posts Block Rest calls.<br />
* Update: Force subscribe a unsubscribed user in mailer lite if the user is requesting subscribe.<br />
* Update: Gallery Align options, allow left and right.<br />
* Update: Responsive gap options for form fields.<br />
* Update: accessibility with form.<br />
* Update: Accordion accessibility.<br />
* Add: Icon color option for buttons.<br />
* Add: Icon size option for buttons.<br />
* Add: Aria Label option for buttons.<br />
* Add: Response Max width options to row layout.<br />
* Fix: CSS issue with accept field.<br />
* Fix: Icon List conversions.<br />
* Fix: Icon List focus on enter.<br />
* Fix: em not being used when selected for button text size.<br />
* Fix: Mobile background url input size.<br />
* Fix: Issue with background overlay opacity setting at 0.<br />
* Fix: Issue with gallery and small images.<br />
* Fix: RTL issues with testimonials.<br />
* Fix: Issue with mobile row border.<br />
* Fix: Issue with accordion toggle and default theme.</p>
<h4>1.10.9</h4>
<p>Release Date: April 16th, 2021<br />
* Fix: Issue with entering hex.</p>
<h4>1.10.8</h4>
<ul>
<li>Add: hidden field option to form block.</li>
<li>Update: rewrite form js, remove jQuery dependency.</li>
<li>Update: Add form field custom error notice options.</li>
<li>Fix: Gallery issue with custom links open in new tab resetting.</li>
<li>Fix: Issue with Table of Contents Block Margin.</li>
<li>Fix: Issue with testimonials wrapper padding unit.</li>
<li>Fix: Editor Row background styles.</li>
<li>Fix: Issue with Radio Buttons showing inline in Form.</li>
<li>Fix: icon list, link text settings.</li>
<li>Fix: Info block issue with icon flip in some browsers.</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.6.10</h4>

<li>Fix: IE issue with testimonial grid.</li>
<li>Add: Column Color settings.</li>
<li>Update: Allow for better fallback when images are small in gallery.</li>
<li>Update: Icon list with up/down move and remove controls.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.9</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fix: Bug with slider in editor nested in rows.</li>
<li>Add: Tab anchor to support custom anchors.</li>
<li>Add: Tab Title column options!</li>
</ul>

<li>Add: Info Box Tablet and Mobile Media Align options.</li>
